item.title: Sun Pharma Slumps On Tariff Uncertainties, Weak Q1 Earnings; SEBI RA Sees Support At ₹1,560
item.description: The pharma giant reported a 20% drop in consolidated net profit to ₹2,279 crore in Q1FY26

item.title: First Solar Credits Trump’s ‘Big Beautiful Bill’ For Putting It In A ‘Better Position’ Than Before, Raises Annual Sales View
item.description: The company now projects net sales between $4.9 billion and $5.7 billion for 2025, compared with a prior estimate of $4.5 billion to $5.5 billion in s...

item.title: Oil Prices Hold Ground As Markets Weigh Trump Tariffs, Russia Sanctions Risks
item.description: Friday’s trade followed a 1% decline in the previous session as Trump unveiled his latest slate of tariffs, which ranged between 10% and 41%.

item.title: Here’s Why Reddit Stock Is Soaring Premarket Today
item.description: Revenue climbed 78% year over year to $500 million, with ad revenues jumping a steeper 84% to $465 million.

item.title: Dabur India: SEBI RA Rajneesh Sharma Sees 11% Potential Upside Despite Lackluster Q1 Earnings
item.description: The FMCG giant posted modest Q1 numbers, with consolidated net profit rising 2.8 % and revenue from operations growing 1.7%
